title: G8 ThinQ hands-on: LG's newest flagship
description: The LG G8 ThinQ is an updated version of the G7  and it can read your palm. LGs big upgrade this year is a new front-facing camera that can detect motion for gesture controls, take improved selfies, and use the pattern of veins in your palm to unlock the phone with Hand ID.
